entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 40%
